channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large cattle gate has come off its hinges no longer serving its purpose, 16th July
item.description:
Marked location on map - footpath from kidnappers lane that goes through to The Burrows Field. Large gate is completely open (off the hinges on the floor to the side) itâ€™s been broken for a while & unlocked - fear cars motorbikes etc can now easily access the field.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 16th July
item.description:
PLEASE CUT BACK HEDGE AND VEGETATION TO BOUNDARY 50M 2 WAY TRAFFIC LIGHTS NOT MARKED (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: DO NOT FELL TREE But please remove large fallen branch and make safe as adjoining pavement and cycle path. Magificent row of Trees of Heaven must not be felled., 16th July
item.description:
A large branch has fallen from one of the magnificent Tree of Heaven trees adjoining pavement and cycleway. Please do NOT fell tree, but make safe. Tree Wardens for Churchdown.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 16th July
item.description:
ENWD ARBS TEAM REQUIRED PLEASE CUT BACK TO SAFE POSITION 1 X TREE 2 WAY TRAFFIC LIGHTS NOT MARKED (Damaged Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 16th July
item.description:
Coming from Tredington - Signage is very hard to see until it is too late as they are on the bend. Please can the TM be looked into.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
